title: Romantic Valentine single-page with evasive 'No' button and 'Good choice' meme reveal

requirements.text: Create a single-page interactive Valentine prompt that has only one purpose: asking the user to be the author’s Valentine, with two options presented as buttons: “Yes” and “No” (English text).

quotes:
The page should be simple, romantic-themed, and have only one purpose: to ask her to be my Valentine.
There should be two options: Yes or No.

acceptanceCriteria: The page shows a clear Valentine question and exactly two primary options labeled “Yes” and “No”.
All user-facing text is in English.
No other flows/pages/features are introduced beyond this interaction.

requirements.text: Implement the “No” button evasive behavior so it moves away when the user tries to interact with it, preventing successful clicks/taps (support both mouse/trackpad and iPad touch).

quotes: When she hovers her cursor over No, it should move away so she cannot click it, forcing her to click only on Yes.

acceptanceCriteria: On desktop, when the pointer enters/approaches the “No” button area, the button relocates to a new position within the visible viewport/container.
On touch devices (e.g., iPad Chrome), attempting to tap the “No” button causes it to move away before activation.
The “No” button never triggers a “No” confirmation state (no modal/alert/route) and is effectively unclickable in normal interaction.

requirements.text: When the user clicks “Yes”, replace or augment the UI to show a romantic confirmation view that displays a meme image and the text “Good choice”.

quotes: When she clicks Yes, show her a meme image telling her "Good choice

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking “Yes” reliably transitions to a success state without page reload.
The success state includes the exact visible phrase “Good choice” and displays the meme image.
The meme image loads from a static asset path (not fetched from the backend).

requirements.text: Apply a romantic visual theme using a pink and white color scheme with consistent typography, spacing, and UI styling across the page.

quotes:
The page should be themed
romantically with a pink and white color scheme

acceptanceCriteria: The primary background/surfaces and controls use a cohesive pink/white palette.
The design looks intentionally romantic (e.g., soft gradients, heart motifs, gentle shadows) while remaining simple and uncluttered.
Buttons and text have sufficient contrast and remain legible on iPad-sized screens.

requirements.text: Ensure the page is fully interactive and works smoothly in iPad Chrome (responsive layout, touch-friendly hit targets, and no reliance on hover-only interactions).

quotes:
be fully interactive using
HTML, CSS, and JavaScript so that I can easily run it on my iPad using Chrome.

acceptanceCriteria: Layout is responsive and fits common iPad viewport sizes in portrait and landscape without overflowing.
All primary interactions work via touch (Yes action, No evasion).
No horizontal scrolling is introduced by the moving “No” button (it stays within a bounded container/viewport).

requirements.text: Add the generated meme image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the “Yes” success state.
acceptanceCriteria: The image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/<filename> and is referenced directly by the frontend.
No backend endpoints are used to serve or transform the image at runtime.

constraints: Frontend must be implemented with the existing React + TypeScript + Tailwind stack (no standalone HTML file delivery).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths defined by the system.
Backend is not required for this feature; do not introduce unnecessary backend state or APIs.
nonGoals: Adding authentication (Internet Identity) or user accounts.
Storing analytics, tracking, or persistence of responses.
Supporting real-time features, messaging, emails, or external API integrations.

required: Meme-style image with a cute romantic aesthetic, bold readable caption text “GOOD CHOICE”, and heart/pink accents (good-choice-meme.dim_900x600.png)
